channel.title: Time Series on Dominic Mariano's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Time Series on Dominic Mariano's blog

item.title: Time Series Graph
item.description: library(Lahman) library(sqldf) library(devtools) library(ggplot2) # extracting the data------------------------ query<-"SELECT yearID,HR FROM Teams Where teamID='NYA'" result<-sqldf(query) #visualize the data------------------- ggplot()+ geom_line(data=result,aes(x=yearID,y=HR))+ xlab('year')+ ylab('homeruns')
